text.text: In this activity, the core team will work through several scenarios to help them empathize with different types of people in their community. The activity will help identify potential barriers to public participation and guide the core team through identifying solutions.
This activity will help the core team ensure that a diversity of needs and perspectives are addressed in the community engagement plan.
Meet with your core team and work through the directions on the centering equity worksheet. The activity includes 3 breakout group scenarios and larger group discussion.

Developing empathy for why people want to participate in public activities, and why it might be hard for them, can lead to a more inclusive engagement plan. Think about what engagement activities will reach different types of people, especially groups that might have significat barriers or under-representation.
